div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 170 Gytheium, Laconia, 1939 Burial: 250-240 B.C. (Oeconomides, Picard) Contents: 33 AR Aegina: 1 dr. Sicyon: 31 triob. Antiochus I: 1 tetradr. (Seleuceia ad Tigrim as ESM 140) Disposition: Athens Varoucha, BCH 1939, p. 288 The Acanthus tetradr. reported in the BCH does not belong to this hd. according to M. Oeconomides
